description: Files with well-known filenames (parts of credential dump software or files produced by them) creation
false_positives: Legitimate Administrator using tool for password recovery
name: Cred Dump Tools Dropped Files
query: (file.path:(*\\pwdump* OR *\\kirbi* OR *\\pwhashes* OR *\\wce_ccache* OR *\\wce_krbtkts* OR *\\fgdump\-log*) OR file.path:(*\\test.pwd OR *\\lsremora64.dll OR *\\lsremora.dll OR *\\fgexec.exe OR *\\wceaux.dll OR *\\SAM.out OR *\\SECURITY.out OR *\\SYSTEM.out OR *\\NTDS.out OR *\\DumpExt.dll OR *\\DumpSvc.exe OR *\\cachedump64.exe OR *\\cachedump.exe OR *\\pstgdump.exe OR *\\servpw.exe OR *\\servpw64.exe OR *\\pwdump.exe OR *\\procdump64.exe))
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov
oscd.community
